page.title: 13FOOD CHANGES IN MILTON.
page.content: In Milton,home life to-day is quite different from that of 50 years ago.My gran says food,and even the buying of food has changed. Instead of going to town to shops like the grocers and butchers,she now shops in a Glenrothes{supermarket.}She does not{shop daily}because she has a {fridge and a freezer}to keep things fresh.Mum used to have dull meals of soup,minced steak or mutton,potatoes, carrots and cabbage,but now she makes curried dishes with spices from{India and{China,}or{Hungarian}goulash,or {Italian}dishes like pizzas,macaroni and spahgetti.My sister and I like {American}sweetcorn and hamburgers.We have a{microwave oven}which makes food cook quickly,because a magnatron changes the energy into microwaves that make the molecules jump,causing friction then heat.
